meanings.definition: Suitcases, bags, and other containers used to hold personal belongings while traveling.
meanings.sent1: I packed my clothes in the luggage for our trip.
meanings.sent2: The airport staff handled the luggage carefully.
meanings.sent3: The luggage decided to take a vacation without me!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumbled mess, like an overstuffed luggage.
meanings.sent5: The colorful luggage stood out on the conveyor belt.

meanings.sent1: The luggage handling at the airport was efficient.
meanings.sent2: He was responsible for the luggage during the journey.
meanings.sent3: The luggage seemed to have a mind of its own during the trip!
meanings.sent4: The weight of the luggage felt like a burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The luggage moved smoothly along the conveyor belt.
